mapper.select: SELECT sum(jjsl)as jjsl,sum(yxjq)as yxjq,sum(cjsl)as cjsl,sum(fksl )as fksl FROM REC_JQTJB WHERE tjrq=#{tjTime} and xzqhdm=substr(#{xzqhdm},1,4)
SELECT sum(jjsl)as jjsl,tjrq from REC_JQTJB WHERE tjrq between #{startTime} and #{endTime} group by tjrq ORDER BY tjrq asc

SELECT sum(jqtjb.jjsl)as jjsl ,sum(jqtjb.yxjq)as yxjq,xzqhb.xzqhmc as xzqhdm from REC_JQTJB jqtjb LEFT JOIN DICT_XZQHB xzqhb ON jqtjb.xzqhdm = substr(xzqhb.xzqhdm,1,4) WHERE tjrq=#{tjTime} group by xzqhb.xzqhmc,jqtjb.yxjq ORDER BY jjsl desc
SELECT hb,yxhb FROM REC_JQTJB WHERE tjrq=#{tjTime} and xzqhdm=substr(#{xzqhdm},1,4)

SELECT sum(jqtjbsj.jjsl)as jjsl,sum(jqtjbsj.yxjq)as yxjq,sum(jqtjbsj.cjsl)as cjsl, sum(jqtjbsj.fksl )as fksl,xzqhbsj.xzqhmc as xzqhdm FROM REC_JQTJB_SJ jqtjbsj LEFT JOIN DICT_XZQHB_SJ xzqhbsj ON jqtjbsj.xzqhdm = xzqhbsj.xzqhdm WHERE tjrq=#{tjTime} and substr(jqtjbsj.xzqhdm,1,4)=substr(#{xzqhdm},1,4) group by xzqhbsj.xzqhmc,jqtjbsj.jjsl,jqtjbsj.yxjq,jqtjbsj.cjsl,jqtjbsj.fksl ORDER BY jjsl desc
